parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Custom Radio and Chat

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sends the chat message to the custom radio channel. The radio channel needs to be created on the server before hand, with [[radioChannelCreate]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[customChat]] [customChannelID, message]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> customChannelID: [[Number]] - [[Channel IDs|Custom channel ID]] returned by [[radioChannelCreate]] command

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> message: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_unit [[customChat]] [1, "Hi, I am a custom chat message"];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> [[File:xChat.jpg|right]]
 [[driver]] [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[sideChat]] "sideChat";
 [[driver]] [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[globalChat]] "globalChat";
 [[driver]] [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[groupChat]] "groupChat";
 [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[vehicleChat]] "vehicleChat";
 [[driver]] [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[commandChat]] "commandChat";
 [[driver]] [[vehicle]] [[player]] [[customChat]] [1, "customChat"];
 [[systemChat]] "systemChat";
<br><comment><!-- needed for the text to display properly with the float…??? --></comment>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[globalChat]], [[groupChat]], [[vehicleChat]], [[commandChat]], [[sideChat]], [[systemChat]], [[radioChannelCreate]], [[customRadio]]
</value></part></template></root>
